name: medical_negative

name: financial_negative

name: long_text_positive
input_text: I had the most wonderful experience at this restaurant. The food was absolutely delicious and the service was impeccable. The atmosphere was perfect and the staff went above and beyond to make our evening special. I would definitely recommend this place to anyone looking for an amazing dining experience.

name: long_text_negative
input_text: This was by far the worst experience I've ever had. The service was incredibly slow and the food was cold when it finally arrived. The staff was rude and unhelpful throughout the entire evening. The prices were outrageous for such poor quality. I will never return to this establishment.

name: boundary_upper_positive
input_text: This is really good and I'm quite satisfied with it.

name: boundary_lower_negative
input_text: This is pretty bad and quite disappointing overall.

name: punctuation_heavy
input_text: Wow!!! This is... amazing??? Really??? I can't believe it!!!

name: numbers_and_text
input_text: I rate this 10 out of 10! Absolutely perfect score.

name: special_characters
input_text: @#$% this is so frustrating! Why can't anything work properly?
